description:
After a trip to the disco on ladies` night, Kyosuke ends up having a date with Hikaru, but when he shows up early, he winds up spending the day with Madoka.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kibun wa Yurete Rolling Hatsu Date
Un rutilante primo appuntamento tra mille indecisioni
気分はゆれて ローリング初デート
